messages.message:
Hey Team,
   On my mac, poetry is not able to install packages via git addresses. I get the following error: *`ssh: Could not resolve hostname https: nodename nor servname provided, or not known`*
When I replace git uri to version number, it works without any error.
I have flushed DNS in vain. Has someone faced such an issue?
what is the git url that is failing?
is it a problem with `:` vs `/` as described here? https://github.com/pypa/pipenv/issues/2541#issuecomment-602110816
just checking, did you set up a SSH key for your github account? https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yQOCxOISV_ukUxXdPJDoN-rERtOhdVRe7zv1swF1igw/edit#heading=h.dpfaai99ygtm
